name: OneUnited Bank
address: While OneUnited Bank does not have a physical branch in Arizona, they serve customers statewide through their online platform. Their main branches are located in Boston, Los Angeles, and Miami
category: African-American-owned Banking relationship management in Arizona
description: As the largest Black-owned bank in the U.S. and the first Black-owned digital bank, OneUnited Bank focuses on financial education and empowering low-to-moderate income communities. They are a designated Community Development Financial Institution (CDFI)

name: UPI Loan Fund (Unified Progress International Loan Fund)
address: While specific physical addresses for loan services are not detailed, they operate within Arizona, focusing on serving the Black population
category: African-American-owned Banking relationship management in Arizona
description: The UPI Loan Fund is a nonprofit organization dedicated to offering low- and no-interest loans to low-income individuals, with a special focus on serving Arizona's Black population. They aim to be the first Black-owned financial lending institution in Arizona and are an emerging Community Development Financial Institution (CDFI)

name: Growth Partners Arizona

category: African-American-owned Banking relationship management in Arizona
description: Growth Partners Arizona is a Black-led Community Development Financial Institution (CDFI) that focuses on expanding services, lending, and support to communities across Arizona.
